EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for contacting The MENTOR Network
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Prospects__c.First_Name__c},
Thank you for your interest in becoming a Mentor and making a difference in someone’s life. Currently, The MENTOR Network does not provide services in {!Prospects__c.zzEmailStateName__c} but we’re always eager to connect with caring individuals like you!
As a national organization we’re always looking for new ways to support individuals throughout the country and we will keep you posted in the event we expand our services in {!Prospects__c.zzEmailStateName__c} in the future.
To learn more about us please visit www.thementornetwork.com.
Thanks again for your interest in becoming a Mentor!
